about_the_game:
🐾 Survival: Dismissed, witness the story of a pet torn from the luxury and comfort of castle life and thrown into the merciless embrace of the wild. In this unique adventure, you must rely on your character's instincts to survive in the wilderness. Danger lurks around every corner, and enemies hide in every shadow!

🏰🌲 Gameplay: With gameplay mechanics similar to other survivor games, you'll struggle to survive in an ever-evolving environment by upgrading your character’s abilities and items. From the safe walls of the castle to the depths of the wild forests, develop clever strategies to ensure your pet does not become prey in this epic journey.

🎮 Features:

Innovative Enhancement System: Customize your abilities and weapons, and enhance your character's survival skills.
Dynamic Enemies and Environment: Each level is filled with new enemies and obstacles waiting for you.
Stunning Graphics and Atmosphere: Every detail has been meticulously crafted, from dark forests to light clearings.
👾 Who’s It For? This game is perfect for anyone who loves fast-paced survival and action games. As you watch your pet evolve, you will be its biggest supporter in the wild!

Are you ready for the survival challenge? Then Paws & Claws: Cast Out of the Castle is just for you! Dive into this wild adventure now and start your struggle to survive in the world outside the castle!

name: Survivor: Dismissed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Survival: Dismissed is an action-packed adventure game about a pet's struggle to survive in the wild after being ousted from the castle. Defeat enemies, gather resources, and evolve to stay alive!
